NAEB RADIO NETWORK
Important
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
To:
From:
Re:
ALL NETWORK STATIONS
NETWORK MANAGER ^
TAPE RETURNS
This memo is being written on a Tuesday morning. Today s mail contained
some 65 tape returns; yesterdayâ€™s mail brought us about 200 tapes. To
dub and mail on schedule (Wednesday) we need about 800 additional tapes.
Thus, you can see why we will not mail tomorrow and why you will not receive
your tapes when expected. As a matter of fact, there is considerable doubt
as to whether we will mail an issue this week. The situation is that bad.
This deplorable situation has been going on for several weeks now. We have
had to erase over 200 master tapes from our master tape storage; also, we
have had to dig into our new tape supply (tapes we use to make masters) in
order to get out several issues: this we cannot afford to do for any great
period of time.
With this background in mind, we now wish to give you your choice: either
you begin returning tapes regularly and receiving your tapes on time or you
may continue not returning tapes and take your chances on when your programs
will arrive, for if we find ourselves without tape from returns we simply
will not mail.
And, if a choice must be made over which stations will receive programs from
the tapes we have on hand, we will give priority to those stations showing
a plus balance on our tape return ledger. Stations owing tapes will receive
them in accord with their respective balances: the fewer tapes a station
owes, the higher priority it will receive.
The choice is yours.
REU/dfc
12-3-57
